Name: Lucid: Parables of the Ubermensch
About the game: “Lucid: Parables of the Ubermensch” is a pixel art 2D platformer with abstract theming where you walk through the dreams of an unknown entity. Lucid is a game that challenges traditional conceptions of what video games are creatively through an uncompromising artistic vision and a subversion of traditional narrative. Every level in Lucid has a unique theme, level mechanic, and story for the player to uncover.
